org.jasonnet.logln

Class Logln

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasonnet.logln.Logln

  • public class Logln
extends Object
    A set of helper functions for logging progress of a program.
    Author:
    jasonnet (1/26/2015)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void logln(String msg)
      A simple static logging method that prefixes the log line with the file name and linenumber of the caller.
      static void logln(String msg, String SHORTFN)
      This is similar tot he logln(msg) method except that the caller can provide a shortened version of the filename to display.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • logln

        public static void logln(String msg)
        A simple static logging method that prefixes the log line with the file name and linenumber of the caller. It also indents the message by the depth of caller on the stack. One can facilitate calling this routine by including a 
         
 import org.jasonnet.logln.Logln.logln;
        at the top of the source java file.
        Parameters:
        msg -

      • logln

        public static void logln(String msg,
         String SHORTFN)
        This is similar tot he logln(msg) method except that the caller can provide a shortened version of the filename to display. One can facilitate calling this routine by including a 
         
 import org.jasonnet.logln.Logln.logln;
        at the top of the source java file.
        Parameters:
        msg -
